data.title: Dean's List
data.text:
The College of Arts & Letters dean's list recognizes academic achievement within a single semester. To be eligible for the dean's list, students must be in good academic standing, an undergraduate, enrolled, and have a grade point average of at least 3.50 (semester GPA only) based on a minimum of 12 units of credit for courses in which letter grades were assigned. The dean's list is published @six-eight weeks after grades are due.

The honor is automatically noted in your transcript (unofficial and official), and names are listed below for a limited time. Please note that if you have placed privacy restrictions on your records, you will not be listed below or receive notice about this honor.

If you have any questions about the Arts and Letters dean's list, please get in touch with us at [email protected].
